example.eg: You should avoid drinking coffee in the evening to ensure a good night's sleep.
example.egtrans: 晚上最好不要喝咖啡，省的睡不着觉。

example.eg: Her cheerful manner ensured her a warm welcome at our house.
example.egtrans: 她乐观欢快，我们家随时欢迎她。

dsense.name: ensure, ensure that, also US: insure, insure that

example.eg: George wanted to ensure that he got a good seat, so he bought his theater tickets a month early.
example.egtrans: 乔治提前一个月就买了戏票，保证订下好座位。
